entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Text inside ContentView doesn't update when using an async command on iOS #7281
  • Running app on Android fine but immediately exits on Windows : "Layout cycle detected. Layout could not complete." #7280
  • .NET MAUI source view showing errors - lots of them! #7279
  • Use of ContentPresenter in a ControlTemplate will cause app to exit on Windows but not Android #7278
  • Dispose() on Razor component not called on application close (Blazor .MAUI Windows app) #7277
  • .Net Maui Multiple Listview errors and program crash on VS2022 (64-bit) Preview Version 17.3.0 Preview 1.0 #7276
  • Resetting Window Page does not update UI #7275
  • MAUI Application.Current.MainPage (17.3.0) = new Shell causes title bar to go translucent #7274
  • Warning in MAUI when referencing a project with GenerateDocumentationFile true #7272
  • ScrollView as child layout not working scrolling #7271
  • Not able to create Msix file for an application with a custom library referred directly #7268
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] CollectionView Horizontal layout using strings not rendering #7264
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] CollectionView Spacing not working using horizontal grid layout #7263
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] CollectionView EmptyView string not working #7262
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] Brushes not working in Frame #7261
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] Crash using Shell #7260
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Request] Allow self-registration of handlers, etc. #7258
    .NET 7
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] Application.Current.Quit not working #7255
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] ListView has performance issues #7254
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] CarouselView freeze trying to use Spacing #7253
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] Navigating from SearchHandler get a blank page #7252
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] Wrong selection in list inside Shell #7251
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] Vertical CollectionView cannot scroll #7250
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] CarouselView wrong behavior of snap points using vertical layout #7249
  • Shell.TabBarIsVisible = "False" not working on WinUI #7246
    6.0.300-servicing
  • TranslateTo animation not working properly under iOS #7244
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Picker control does not respect size imposed by parent. #7243
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Adaptive Trigger on StackLayout crashes Windows. #7242

Closed

  • [IOS] InputTransparency always cascaded to Children even when CascadeInputTransparent= false #6574
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Delete this test #7273
  • iOS image in displaying as a black blob #7266
  • Including Microsoft.Identity.Client in .net Maui project causes it to fail to build when ios is targeted #7199
  • Android FormattedText and LineHeights are not correct #7220
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Label sometimes displays hugely wrong font size and spacing #6801
    6.0.300-servicing
  • RadioButtons are not properly styled in MAUI RC3 #7248
  • Manual iOS Provisioning #7056

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure that the z-index sort also preserves original add order #7270
  • [Controls.Core] Handle Null Values for AdaptiveTrigger #7267
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-servicing
  • [Android] Render Border without set a Stroke #7247
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [X] Add compiled converters #7245
    area/Xaml </>

Merged

  • Allow LayoutView to pass touches to child controls when CascadeInputTransparent is false #7236
    area/layout 🔲
  • Add a Semaphore for AttachAndRun #7269
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Bump Castle.Core from 4.4.1 to 5.0.0 #7256
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix Android FormattedText and related platforms #7219
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Added pending lifecycle events hooks #7225
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0 #7224
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0 #7223
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Cleanup cake file, add targets, fix for iOS Pair #7241
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #7235
    area/controls 🎮
